Package applianceHandlers

package applianceHandlers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddApplianceConfirmHandler
    Handles the logic for confirming the addition of a new appliance.
    AddApplianceDeptHandler
    Handles the HTTP request for selecting an appliance department.
    AddApplianceTypeHandler
    Handles HTTP requests for selecting the appliance type based on the selected department.
    ApplianceList
    Handles HTTP requests for displaying a list of appliances.
    DeleteApplianceConfirmationHandler
    Handles the HTTP requests for confirming the deletion of an appliance.
    DeleteApplianceHandler
    Handles the HTTP requests for deleting an appliance.
    EditApplianceForm
    Handles HTTP requests for displaying the edit appliance form.
    UpdateApplianceHandler
    Handles HTTP requests for updating an appliance's details.
